1: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <sup>3615 </sup> <n>Now when all this was finished</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹ֗את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> יָצְא֨וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>all Israel</n> הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֮ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>that were present</n> לְעָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to the cities</n> יְהוּדָה֒ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וַיְשַׁבְּר֣וּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>in pieces</n> הַמַּצֵּב֣וֹת <sup>4676 </sup> <n>the images</n> וַיְגַדְּע֣וּ <sup>1438 </sup> <n>and cut down</n> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֡ים <sup>842 </sup> <n>the groves</n> וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <sup>5422 </sup> <n>and threw down</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֠בָּמוֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>the high places</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֞ת <sup>4196 </sup> <n>and the altars</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְהוּדָ֧ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>out of all Judah</n> וּבִנְיָמִ֛ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> וּבְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>in Ephraim</n> וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>also and Manasseh</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> לְכַלֵּ֑ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>until they had utterly destroyed</n> וַיָּשׁ֜וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>returned</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בְּנֵ֧י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>them all Then all the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> לַאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <sup>272 </sup> <n>to his possession</n> לְעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into their own cities</n> ס
2: וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>appointed</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֡הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>and Hezekiah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַחְלְק֣וֹת <sup>4256 </sup> <n>the courses</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priests</n> וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and the Levites</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> מַחְלְקוֹתָ֞ם <sup>4256 </sup> <n>after their courses</n> אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> כְּפִ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according</n> עֲבֹדָת֗וֹ <sup>5656 </sup> <n>to his service</n> לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priests</n> וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and Levites</n> לְעֹלָ֖ה <sup>5930 </sup> <n>for burnt offerings</n> וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <sup>8002 </sup> <n>and for peace offerings</n> לְשָׁרֵת֙ <sup>8334 </sup> <n>to minister</n> וּלְהֹד֣וֹת <sup>3034 </sup> <n>and to give thanks</n> וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and to praise</n> בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <sup>8179 </sup> <n>in the gates</n> מַחֲנ֥וֹת <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the tents</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> ס
3: וּמְנָת֩ <sup>4521 </sup> <n>portion</n> הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>[He appointed] also the king's</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> רְכוּשׁ֜וֹ <sup>7399 </sup> <n>of his substance</n> לָעֹל֗וֹת <sup>5930 </sup> <n>for the burnt offerings</n> לְעֹלוֹת֙ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>burnt offerings</n> הַבֹּ֣קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>[to wit] for the morning</n> וְהָעֶ֔רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>and evening</n> וְהָ֣עֹל֔וֹת <sup>5930 </sup> <n>and the burnt offerings</n> לַשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <sup>7676 </sup> <n>for the sabbaths</n> וְלֶחֳדָשִׁ֣ים <sup>2320 </sup> <n>and for the new moons</n> וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <sup>4150 </sup> <n>and for the set feasts</n> כַּכָּת֖וּב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>as [it is] written</n> בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <sup>8451 </sup> <n>in the law</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
4: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Moreover he commanded</n> לָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that dwelt</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> לָתֵ֕ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> מְנָ֥ת <sup>4521 </sup> <n>the portion</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priests</n> וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and the Levites</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>might</n> יֶחֶזְק֖וּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>that they might be encouraged</n> בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <sup>8451 </sup> <n>in the law</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
5: וְכִפְרֹ֣ץ <sup>6555 </sup> <n>came abroad</n> הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And as soon as the commandment</n> הִרְבּ֤וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>in abundance</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> רֵאשִׁ֣ית <sup>7225 </sup> <n>the firstfruits</n> דָּגָ֗ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>of corn</n> תִּיר֤וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>wine</n> וְיִצְהָר֙ <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and oil</n> וּדְבַ֔שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n> וְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> תְּבוּאַ֣ת <sup>8393 </sup> <n>and of all the increase</n> שָׂדֶ֑ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>and the tithe</n> הַכֹּ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> לָרֹ֖ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>they in abundantly</n> הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>brought</n>
6: וּבְנֵ֧י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And [concerning] the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֮ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that dwelt</n> בְּעָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the cities</n> יְהוּדָה֒ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> הֵ֗ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>in</n> מַעְשַׂ֤ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>the tithe</n> בָּקָר֙ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of oxen</n> וָצֹ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and sheep</n> וּמַעְשַׂ֣ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>and the tithe</n> קָֽדָשִׁ֔ים <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of holy things</n> הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <sup>6942 </sup> <n>which were consecrated</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> הֵבִ֕יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they also brought in</n> וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and laid</n> עֲרֵמ֥וֹת <sup>6194 </sup> <n>heaps</n> עֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <sup>6194 </sup> <n>heaps</n> ס
7: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <sup>7992 </sup> <n>In the third</n> הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>they began</n> הָעֲרֵמ֖וֹת <sup>6194 </sup> <n>of the heaps</n> לְיִסּ֑וֹד <sup>3245 </sup> <n>to lay the foundation</n> וּבַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>[them] in the seventh</n> כִּלּֽוּ׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>and finished</n> ס
8: וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and the princes</n> וַיִּרְא֖וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and saw</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעֲרֵמ֑וֹת <sup>6194 </sup> <n>the heaps</n> וַֽיְבָרֲכוּ֙ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>they blessed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> עַמּ֥וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and his people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> פ
9: וַיִּדְרֹ֣שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>questioned</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֛ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>with the priests</n> וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and the Levites</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הָעֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <sup>6194 </sup> <n>concerning the heaps</n>
10: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>answered</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עֲזַרְיָ֧הוּ <sup>5838 </sup> <n>And Azariah</n> הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priest</n> הָרֹ֖אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the chief</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> צָד֑וֹק <sup>6659 </sup> <n>of Zadok</n> וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and said</n> מֵהָחֵ֨ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>Since [the people] began</n> הַתְּרוּמָ֜ה <sup>8641 </sup> <n>the offerings</n> לָבִ֣יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to bring</n> בֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אָכ֨וֹל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to eat</n> וְשָׂב֤וֹעַ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>we have had enough</n> וְהוֹתֵר֙ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>and have left</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>with</n> לָר֔וֹב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>plenty</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> בֵּרַ֣ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>hath blessed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <sup>3498 </sup> <n>and that which is left</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הֶהָמ֥וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>[is] this great store</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>and this</n> ס
11: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> לְהָכִ֧ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>to prepare</n> לְשָׁכ֛וֹת <sup>3957 </sup> <n>chambers</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in the house</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיָּכִֽינוּ׃ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>and they prepared</n>
12: וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And brought in</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתְּרוּמָ֧ה <sup>8641 </sup> <n>the offerings</n> וְהַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֛ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>and the tithes</n> וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <sup>6944 </sup> <n>and the dedicated</n> בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>[things] faithfully</n> וַעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>charge</n> נָגִיד֙ <sup>5057 </sup> <n>[was] ruler</n> [כֹּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֣הוּ <sup>3562 </sup> <n>Conaniah</n> ק) הַלֵּוִ֔י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>the Levite</n> וְשִׁמְעִ֥י <sup>8096 </sup> <n>and Shimei</n> אָחִ֖יהוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <sup>4932 </sup> <n>[was] the next</n>
13: וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <sup>3171 </sup> <n>And Jehiel</n> וַ֠עֲזַזְיָהוּ <sup>5812 </sup> <n>and Azaziah</n> וְנַ֨חַת <sup>5184 </sup> <n>and Nahath</n> וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֜ל <sup>6214 </sup> <n>and Asahel</n> וִֽירִימ֤וֹת <sup>3406 </sup> <n>and Jerimoth</n> וְיוֹזָבָד֙ <sup>3107 </sup> <n>and Jozabad</n> וֶאֱלִיאֵ֣ל <sup>447 </sup> <n>and Eliel</n> וְיִסְמַכְיָ֔הוּ <sup>3253 </sup> <n>and Ismachiah</n> וּמַ֖חַת <sup>4287 </sup> <n>and Mahath</n> וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <sup>1141 </sup> <n>and Benaiah</n> פְּקִידִ֗ים <sup>6496 </sup> <n>[were] overseers</n> מִיַּ֤ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>under the hand</n> [כָּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>3562 </sup> <n>Conaniah</n> ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <sup>8096 </sup> <n>and Shimei</n> אָחִ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> בְּמִפְקַד֙ <sup>4662 </sup> <n>at the commandment</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <sup>5838 </sup> <n>and Azariah</n> נְגִ֥יד <sup>5057 </sup> <n>the ruler</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n>
14: וְקוֹרֵ֨א <sup>6981 </sup> <n>And Kore</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יִמְנָ֤ה <sup>3232 </sup> <n>of Imnah</n> הַלֵּוִי֙ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>the Levite</n> הַשּׁוֹעֵ֣ר <sup>7778 </sup> <n>the porter</n> לַמִּזְרָ֔חָה <sup>4217 </sup> <n>toward the east</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> נִדְב֣וֹת <sup>5071 </sup> <n>[was] over the freewill offerings</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> לָתֵת֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to distribute</n> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <sup>8641 </sup> <n>the oblations</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <sup>6942 </sup> <n>appoint</n> הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>and the most</n>
15: וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Under</n> יָד֡וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by</n> עֵ֣דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>And next him [were] Eden</n> וּ֠מִנְיָמִן <sup>4509 </sup> <n>and Miniamin</n> וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <sup>3442 </sup> <n>and Jeshua</n> וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֜הוּ <sup>8098 </sup> <n>and Shemaiah</n> אֲמַרְיָ֧הוּ <sup>568 </sup> <n>Amariah</n> וּשְׁכַנְיָ֛הוּ <sup>7935 </sup> <n>and Shecaniah</n> בְּעָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the cities</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priests</n> בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>in [their] set office</n> לָתֵ֤ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>to their brethren</n> בְּמַחְלְק֔וֹת <sup>4256 </sup> <n>courses</n> כַּגָּד֖וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>as well to the great</n> כַּקָּטָֽן׃ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>as to the small</n>
16: מִלְּבַ֞ד <sup>905 </sup> <n>to</n> הִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <sup>3187 </sup> <n>Beside their genealogy</n> לִזְכָרִ֗ים <sup>2145 </sup> <n>of males</n> מִבֶּ֨ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> שָׁל֤וֹשׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>from three</n> שָׁנִים֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <sup>4605 </sup> <n>and upward</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>who</n> הַבָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[even] unto every one that entereth</n> לְבֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לִדְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>portion</n> י֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his daily</n> בְּיוֹמ֑וֹ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his daily</n> לַעֲב֣וֹדָתָ֔ם <sup>5656 </sup> <n>for their service</n> בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֖ם <sup>4931 </sup> <n>in their charges</n> כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4256 </sup> <n>according to their courses</n>
17: וְאֵ֨ת <sup>853 </sup> הִתְיַחֵ֤שׂ <sup>3188 </sup> <n>genealogy</n> הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priests</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>by the house</n> אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and the Levites</n> מִבֶּ֛ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>from twenty</n> שָׁנָ֖ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וּלְמָ֑עְלָה <sup>4605 </sup> <n>and upward</n> בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4931 </sup> <n>in their charges</n> בְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4256 </sup> <n>by their courses</n>
18: וּלְהִתְיַחֵ֗שׂ <sup>3188 </sup> <n>genealogy</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> טַפָּ֧ם <sup>2945 </sup> <n>of all their little ones</n> נְשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <sup>802 </sup> <n>their wives</n> וּבְנֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and their sons</n> וּבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> קָהָ֑ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>through all the congregation</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>themselves</n> בֶאֱמוּנָתָ֖ם <sup>530 </sup> <n>for in their set office</n> יִתְקַדְּשׁוּ־ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>they sanctified</n> קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>themselves in holiness</n>
19: וְלִבְנֵי֩ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Also of the sons</n> אַהֲרֹ֨ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>of Aaron</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priests</n> בִּשְׂדֵ֨י <sup>7704 </sup> <n>[which were] in the fields</n> מִגְרַ֤שׁ <sup>4054 </sup> <n>of the suburbs</n> עָרֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of their cities</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in every several city</n> וָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נִקְּב֖וּ <sup>5344 </sup> <n>that were expressed</n> בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by name</n> לָתֵ֣ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> מָנ֗וֹת <sup>4490 </sup> <n>portions</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to every</n> זָכָר֙ <sup>2145 </sup> <n>to all the males</n> בַּכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>among the priests</n> וּלְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everyone</n> הִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <sup>3187 </sup> <n>and to all that were reckoned by genealogies</n> בַּלְוִיִּֽם׃ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>among the Levites</n>
20: וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And thus did</n> כָּזֹ֛את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>throughout all Judah</n> וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and wrought</n> הַטּ֤וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[that which was] good</n> וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and right</n> וְהָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>and truth</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>his God</n>
21: וּבְכָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> מַעֲשֶׂ֞ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>And in every work</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הֵחֵ֣ל ׀ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>that he began</n> בַּעֲבוֹדַ֣ת <sup>5656 </sup> <n>in the service</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּבַתּוֹרָה֙ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>and in the law</n> וּבַמִּצְוָ֔ה <sup>4687 </sup> <n>and in the commandments</n> לִדְרֹ֖שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>to seek</n> לֵֽאלֹהָ֑יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>his God</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבָב֥וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>[it] with all his heart</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he did</n> וְהִצְלִֽיחַ׃ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and prospered</n> פ
